subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L., under siege on many fronts, is facing a potential quarterback vacuum. Who will step up to fill the void? And, perhaps more critically, how marketable will that new guard be?
snippet: The N.F.L., under siege on many fronts, is facing a potential quarterback vacuum. Who will step up to fill the void? And, perhaps more critically, how marketable will that new guard be?
